userStories.title: Extract build data from HTML files
acceptanceCriteria: Extract year, make, model, submodel from HTML
Output builds.json with all extracted builds
userStories.notes: Completed: 3717/3731 builds extracted. 14 skipped (missing year/make/model). Top makes: Chevrolet (496), Ford (318), BMW (298).

userStories.title: Extract modifications from build data
acceptanceCriteria: Extract wheels, tires, and suspension as modifications
userStories.notes: Completed: 8049 mods extracted (3717 wheels, 3717 tires, 615 suspension). All builds have mods attached.
